price: 97. Usun (koros kinnuk) elle kaskassoowan astootik kulli asta keenih tamaate way qansarissa digaala ubullu haanam fanah tu keenih xiqa iimaanah ma yaaminan.
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaw jāathum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
